snippet: An 18-year-old bicyclist and a 42-year-old pedestrian died a few miles and about an hour apart, the police said. A driver who fled the second accident was later arrested.
lead_paragraph: An 18-year-old bicyclist and a 42-year-old pedestrian died a few miles and about an hour apart, the police said. A driver who fled the second accident was later arrested.

headline.seo: Two Men Are Killed in Separate Hit-and-Runs in the Bronx
headline.main: Two Are Killed in the Bronx in Separate Hit-and-Runs
headline.print_headline: Two Are Killed in the Bronx In Separate Hit-and-Runs
